introduction: The film etude made by Agnieszka Osiecka during her school years, is a unique recording of some fragments of satirical shows performed by the legendary STS Student Satirical Theatre, one of th emost interesting cultural revelations during Polish October. The film is a story about the work of the theatre team with fragments of various shows relating to censorship in Poland, Wladyslaw Gomulka's role in the Communist Party, etc.
